block.p: Laura Rachael Keller, a lawyer, is to be married today to Alan Isenberg, a television news producer. Melvin Grant, a marriage officer for the Bahamas, is to officiate there at the One & Only Ocean Club, a resort on Paradise Island. Afterward, Rabbi Michael Siegel and Cantor Alberto Mizrahi are to perform a religious ceremony.

The bride, 27, is a litigation associate in the New York office of Paul, Hastings, Janofsky & Walker, the Los Angeles law firm, where she focuses on intellectual property. She graduated from Duke and received a law degree from New York University.

Laura Rachael Keller, a lawyer, is to be married today to Alan Isenberg, a television news producer. Melvin Grant, a marriage officer for the Bahamas, is to officiate there at the One & Only Ocean Club, a resort on Paradise Island. Afterward, Rabbi Michael Siegel and Cantor Alberto Mizrahi are to perform a religious ceremony.

Laura Rachael Keller, a lawyer, is to be married today to Alan Isenberg, a television news producer. Melvin Grant, a marriage officer for the Bahamas, is to officiate there at the One & Only Ocean Club, a resort on Paradise Island. Afterward, Rabbi Michael Siegel and Cantor Alberto Mizrahi are to perform a religious ceremony.

The bride, 27, is a litigation associate in the New York office of Paul, Hastings, Janofsky & Walker, the Los Angeles law firm, where she focuses on intellectual property. She graduated from Duke and received a law degree from New York University.
She is a daughter of Bonnie Keller and Dr. Alex Keller of Manhasset, N.Y. Her father is a plastic surgeon and her mother is a medical biller, both in Great Neck, N.Y.

The bridegroom, 28, works in Washington as a producer of guest interview segments on the ''The Situation Room,'' a daily program on CNN. He graduated from the University of Pennsylvania and received a law degree from Stanford.

He is the son of Judy Isenberg of Highland Park, Ill., and Howard Isenberg of Wheeling, Ill. His father, who is retired, worked in Rosemont, Ill., as a vice president for international operations and sales at a manufacturing division of CCL Industries, a Canadian consumer products packaging company.
